basics.name: Alejandro Cabrera González
basics.label: Junior Full Stack Developer & Historian of Science
basics.summary: Junior full stack developer and Historian with knowledge in HTML5, CSS, SCSS, XML, Bootstrap, Java, JavaScript, VUE, Python, R, Shiny, MySQL, MongoDB, PHP, and Node.js. I live in Barcelona, Spain. I have worked in various fields related to the educational sector and the cultural sector.

work.name: ESSistemas
work.summary: I developed prototypes in Figma and Illustrator, as well as parts of the main website's Partner Portal using languages and styles such as HTML, JavaScript, and SCSS.

work.name: Holaluz
work.summary: I performed customer service tasks such as answering telephone calls, incident assistance, resolving user queries, as well as ticketing.

work.name: Fundació Salut i Envelliment
work.summary: I digitised journals and books from all areas of medicine using devices: the HP LaserJet multifunction printer scanner with touch display, and the ScanSnap SV60011 hybrid technology scanner; I catalogued books and journals in the Sierra program, which allows for the management of electronic resources, circulation, cataloguing, acquisitions, etc.; I carried out the distribution and management of deposits, as well as public service tasks.

work.name: Barcelona Activa
work.summary: I digitised magazines and books of all kinds. I reinforced the activities suggested by the English specialist. I offered assistance in the development of tasks related to the foreign language project. I collaborated in the English actions and projects in which the centre participated. I encouraged the students' interest in the use of English in the classroom. I improved the students' oral communicative competence in English. I created support materials that promoted conversation in the English language.

education.institution: Escoles Universitàries Gimbernat i Tomàs Cerdà

education.area: History of Science: Science, Historr and Society

certificates.name: The Complete JavaScript Course 2024: From Zero to Expert!

publications.name: EL MUSEO DE PATOLOGÍA VEGETAL Y TERAPÉUTICA VEGETAL DE BARCELONA ¿UN MUSEO ACTIVO, ÚTILY EFÍMERO?
publications.summary: Master's Thesis on the now-defunct Museum of Plant Pathology in the city of Barcelona. Developed from biological frameworks provided by the Museum of Science and Technology of Catalonia (mNACTEC).

projects.name: Aviators game
projects.description: Battle Game where you can choose two aviation aces cards to fight among themselves
